cause.description:
"The sword is worse than death, famine is harder than the sword, captivity is worst of all.." Babylonian Talmud, Tractate Bava Ba
"Thy children shall come again to their own border" Jeremiah 31,17
Since 1982 nine Israeli soldiers have been taken captive.
All of these men are known to have been captured alive; and since there capture, a steady flow of information has been leaked to suggest that they are still alive, and being held captive in Syria and Iran. Despite the diplomatic and military efforts of successive Israeli governments, almost no progress has been made in determining the fate of these missing fathers, sons and husbands.
ZACHARY BAMUEL YEHUDA KATZ TZVI FELDMAN RON ARAD GUY HEVER GILAD SHALIT EHUD (UDI) GOLDWASSER ELAD REGEV
We also cannot forget those non-Jewish men who put their lives on the live to protect Israel, and MIA: Madji Halabi
For more information about the 2006 MIAs, check out: http://www.banim.org/en/index_en.html
Sign the petition: http://www.banim.org/en/atzuma_en.html
Mazkir (head) of FZY, Samuel Green, has released a record to publicise the MIA cause. All proceeds go to charity: http://www.antithesistherapper.com/
1. Take a stand against the injustice of holding these men as secret prisoners
2. Demands that their captors comply with international law and hand back these soldiers.
3. Get these boys back to their families
4. Raise awareness of the MIA cause
cause.mission: To raise awareness for the sons, fathers and husbands who have been taken captive whilst serving the state of Israel
cause.name: Israel's MIAs
